校園團契

每週五7:00~8:45PM
There are dozens of Chinese Christian students that attend UCR. They all have a similar background and a need to communicate and study in Chinese for religious purposes. We want to initiate this student organization to provide more opportunities for further understanding of the Christian faith, meet on and off-campus, and better connect this group overall. This group has been less represented in the past and our goal is to collect their voices in hopes to create a safe space of unity in Christ.

Links:
Campus organization ICCF
FaceBook Group

英語會話班English Conversation

每週五5:00~6:00 PM

英文会话班由Maggie老师带领。 Maggie是native speaker，口音很清晰。小班上课，课程内容就是日常对话、时事聊天、驾照考试等，会根据学生兴趣调整。



更多小组更新内容请发送至weilei.zeng@foxmail.com
